DOC.brief_summary: Over past 5 year , change clinical practice use cuff instead uncuffed endotracheal tube infant child . Two manufacturing company recently introduce syringe-like device market allow measurement intracuff pressure . This study propose prospectively compare intracuff pressure device gold standard technique ( manometer ) .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age young , undergoing procedure require endotracheal intubation cuff ETT .
